TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemBindingCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemBindingCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class MenuItemBindingCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合中的物件控制項。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控制項會使用類別的資料類型作為其屬性。The control uses the class as the data type for its property. 屬性用來儲存定義的任何功能表項目繫結控制項。The property is used to store any menu item bindings defined for the control. > [!NOTE] > 順序物件會出現在集合中有不會影響這些物件如何套用至功能表項目在控制項。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. 類別支援數種方式可存取集合中的項目：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用用來直接擷取索引子特定的以零為起始索引處的物件。Use the indexer to directly retrieve the object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法，以建立可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法，將集合的內容複製到陣列。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an array. 您可以透過程式設計方式管理新增和移除的物件物件。You can programmatically manage a object by adding and removing objects. 若要加入集合中的功能表項目，請使用或方法。To add menu items to the collection, use the or the method. 若要從集合中移除節點，使用，則，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , the , or the method. 類別包含屬性和方法可讓您擷取集合本身的相關資訊。The class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要了解在集合中有多少項目，使用屬性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果您想要判斷集合是否包含特定物件，請使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要取得的索引物件在集合中，使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何填入物件以宣告方式。The following code example demonstrates how to populate a object declaratively. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Map.xml 檔案複製下列的 XML 資料範例。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/CS/menubindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/VB/menubindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增物件至物件以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to add objects to a object programmatically. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Map.xml 檔案複製下列的 XML 資料範例。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. span.span: The to append to the end of the collection.

summary.span: 將指定的 物件附加到集合的結尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

returns.span: 集合中已插入 的索引。

span.span: The index at which the was inserted in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將附加指定物件至集合結尾。Use the method to append the specified object to the end of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以將 null 值，並重複物件加入集合。You can add null values and duplicate objects to the collection. 或者，您可以插入中所使用的特定索引處的集合物件方法。As an alternative, you can insert a object in the collection at a specific index by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 順序物件會出現在集合中有不會影響這些物件如何套用至功能表項目在控制項。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將附加物件的結尾的集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a object to the end of the collection of a control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Map.xml 檔案複製下列的 XML 資料範例。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷是否物件包含在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a object is contained in the collection. 這個方法通常用來測試是否存在之前執行的工作，例如加入或移除集合中的功能表項目繫結的物件。This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a menu item binding from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將集合的內容複製到指定之以零起始的陣列。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array. 從目標陣列的指定索引處開始複製的項目。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 陣列，您可以接著使用陣列語法來存取中的項目物件。With the array, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the object. 或者，您也可以使用方法用來建立列舉值，可用來存取集合中的項目。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將複製集合至陣列的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from the collection to an array. 陣列會逐一顯示的屬性物件。The array is then iterated through to display the properties of the objects. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Map.xml 檔案複製下列的 XML 資料範例。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷指定之索引集合中的物件。Use the method to determine the index of the specified object in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 順序物件會出現在集合中有不會影響這些物件如何套用至功能表項目在控制項。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. 如果功能表項目繫結不是集合中，這個方法會傳回-1。If the menu item binding is not in the collection, the method returns -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的功能表項目繫結集合中出現多次，則會傳回第一次出現的索引。If the specified menu item binding appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以判斷索引集合中的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine the index of a object in the collection. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Map.xml 檔案複製下列的 XML 資料範例。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用從集合移除指定的功能表項目繫結的方法。Use the method to remove the specified menu item binding from the collection. 然後遵循該功能表項目的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 此外，也會更新已移動項目的索引。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 集合可以包含 null 值，以及重複物件。The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 或者，您可以移除功能表項目集合中特定索引使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the method. 您也可以移除集合中所有功能表項目，使用方法。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 順序物件會出現在集合中有不會影響這些物件如何套用至功能表項目在控制項。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來移除集合中的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a object from the collection. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Map.xml 檔案複製下列的 XML 資料範例。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
